title: Coral colony discovered by mother and daughter citizen scientists could be world's largest
desc: Mother and daughter citizen scientists find what is believed to be the largest coral colony on the Great Barrier Reef and possibly in the world.

title: Kash Patel fires FBI officials linked to Trump documents case, reports say
desc: Dismissals follow revelations that FBI subpoenaed records of Patel and Susie Wiles before Trump returned to office

title: Guardian Essential report: One Nation woos progressive voters - Australian Politics podcast
desc: Political reporter Josh Butler and Essential Media executive director Peter Lewis discuss why Pauline Hanson’s party is attracting voters across the political spectrum

title: Grandmaster Viswanathan Anand believes Australia ready to become chess country
desc: Five-time World Chess Champion Viswanathan Anand says he believes Australia could be on the verge of becoming a proud chess nation.

title: Will Richard scores 21 as Warriors put 8 players in double figures and beat the Grizzlies 133-112
desc: Will Richard scored 21 points, Brandin Podziemski and Gary Payton II added 19 apiece and the Golden State Warriors routed the Memphis Grizzlies 133-112 on Wednesday night in a game between two teams depleted by injuries. Gui Santos added 17 points as eight of the nine Golden State players who saw action reached double figures. The ninth player, Malevy Leons, had nine points.

title: Census 2027: Over 3.2 million enumerators to use handheld devices in a fully digital system - full details
desc: The 2027 Census in India will be the first fully digital undertaking, employing the Census Management and Monitoring System (CMMS). With handheld devices and geo-tagging, it promises enhanced accuracy and efficiency, replacing traditional paper methods and allowing self-enumeration for citizens.

title: Canada signals shift, says India not linked to violent crimes anymore
desc: India News: NEW DELHI: Canada on Wednesday clarified that it does not believe India is linked to violent crimes on its soil, signalling a diplomatic thaw with New.

title: Asia’s Biggest Banks Line Up Bids for HSBC Indonesia Assets
desc: Some of Asia’s biggest banks are working on bids for HSBC Holdings Plc’s retail assets in Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter, helping them to forge ahead in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.

title: Scientists Craft Unmatched Molecular Map of Down Syndrome Brain

title: France’s Le Pen: I won’t run for president wearing an ankle bracelet
desc: The French far-right leader says she hasn’t lost all hope of running in next year’s election despite ominous legal clouds.
